title: Possible data coruption detected ?!
body: Umm , hello i get this very often lately , what do i need to do if i alredy pressed ok 2 times and its back again , any help? {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
If you have to repair often due to data corruption, it's likely your League installation is corrupt beyond repair. To resolve this, I suggest running our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi), checking the box for Reinstall along with the box for a Clean uninstall. After League is reinstalled, ensure it has the right [system permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions#wq3) to run properly.

If you have any issues after running those steps, let me know. Thanks!
